text: leda miru: "Okavela niscayanga, mapai grantham avatarimpa jeyabadi unde memu vari kante uttamaritilo sanmargam mida nadici undevaramu." Ani antarani. Kabatti vastavaniki ippudu mi prabhuvu taraphu nundi mi vaddaku oka spastamaina pramanam, margadarsakatvam mariyu karunyam (i khur'an) vaccindi. Ika allah sucanalanu asatyalani palike vadikante, vati patla vaimukhyam pradarsince vadi kante, mincina durmargudevadu? Kabatti ma sucanala patla vimukhata cupevariki, vari i vaimukhyaniki phalitanga bhayankaramaina siksa vidhistamu
